Lisa_Hewitt:
{{short description|Canadian country music singer}} {{Use mdy dates|date=February 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Lisa Hewitt | image = Lisa_Hewitt.jpg | caption = Lisa Hewitt, November 2005 | image_size = | background = solo_singer | origin = Canada | instrument = | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer | years_active = 1999–present | label = Socan, [[Royalty Records|Royalty]], 306 | associated_acts = | website = {{official website|http://www.lisahewitt.com}} }} '''Lisa Hewitt''' is a Canadian [[country music]] singer. Hewitt released her self-titled debut album on the independent Socan Records in 1999. Her second album, ''The Road I Chose'', was released in 2004 by [[Royalty Records]]. Its first single, "One of These Goodbyes," reached the Top 25 on the ''[[Radio & Records]]'' Canadian country singles chart. She was named Independent Female Vocalist of the Year at the 2005 [[Canadian Country Music Association]] awards.{{cite web|url=http://secure4.worldsites.net/countrymusicnews-ca/news.ihtml?step=2&article_id=953 |title=2005 CCMA Award Winners |publisher=[[Country Music News]] |accessdate=October 31, 2009 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://archive.today/20110721214751/http://secure4.worldsites.net/countrymusicnews-ca/news.ihtml?step=2&article_id=953 |archivedate=July 21, 2011 }} Hewitt was featured in 2006 on the [[CMT (Canada)|CMT]] series ''Plucked'', a documentary about six country music stars in training.{{cite web|url=http://www.channelcanada.com/Article1517.html |title=CMT Premieres New Original Production Plucked this october |publisher=Channel Canada |accessdate=October 31, 2009 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20100104142711/http://channelcanada.com/Article1517.html |archivedate=January 4, 2010 }} In 2009, Hewitt was signed to 306 Records.[http://www.306records.com/news.cfm?JournalID=16723&UserID=22 306 Records] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20090302032447/http://www.306records.com/news.cfm?JournalID=16723&UserID=22 |date=March 2, 2009 }} Her third album, ''Fearless'', was released in March 2009. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:12em;"| Title ! style="width:19em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''Lisa Hewitt'' | * Release date: September 1, 1999 * Label: Socan Records * Formats: CD, [[Compact cassette|cassette]] |- ! scope="row"| ''The Road I Chose'' | * Release date: October 19, 2004 * Label: [[Royalty Records]] * Formats: CD, [[music download]] |- ! scope="row"| ''Fearless'' | * Release date: March 31, 2009 * Label: 306 Records * Formats: CD, music download |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:16em;"| Single !
